API¶

News Volume¶

Utilities¶

Database¶

Title : Database Description : Defines class Database, which uses SQLite3 to manage a database file. Author : Bernardo Paulsen Version : 1.0.0

class data_collection.news_volume.utilities.database.Database(name: str = 'test.db', table: str = 'test', log_name: str = 'database', log_file: str = 'log')¶

Class which connects to and edits database using SQLite3.

Parameters

  • name (str, optional) – Name of database file, defaults to “test.db”

  • table (str, optional) – Name of table in database, defaults to “test”

  • log_name (str, optional) – Logger name, defaults to “database”

  • log_file (str, optional) – Log file name, defaults to “log.log”

commit()¶

Commits changes.

config()¶

Connects to database, drops table if it exists and creates new table.

get_create()¶

Returns script used to create table.

Returns

create table script

Return type

str

get_drop()¶

Returns scrip used to drop table.

Returns

drop table script

Return type

str

insert(date: str, title: str)¶

Inserts values into database.

Parameters

  • date (str) – Article date

  • title (str) – Article title

Logger¶

Title : Logger Description : Defines class logger, which implements a custom logger. Author : Bernardo Paulsen Version : 1.0.0

class data_collection.news_volume.utilities.logger.Logger(name: str, file: str = 'log', level: int = 10, mode: str = 'a', format_: str = '%(asctime)s::%(name)s::%(levelname)s::%(message)s')¶

Class which implements a custom logger.

Parameters

  • name (str) – Logger name

  • file (str, optional) – Log file name, defaults to “log”

  • level (int, optional) – Log level, defaults to logging.DEBUG

  • mode (str, optional) – Log file mode, defaults to “a”

  • format (str, optional) – Log format, defaults to “%(asctime)s:%(name)s:%(levelname)s:%(message)s”

config(name: str, file: str, level: int, mode: str, format_: str)¶

Configures logger.

Parameters

  • name (str) – Logger name

  • file (str) – Log file name

  • level (int) – Log level

  • mode (str) – Log file mode

  • format (str) – Log format

Returns

Logger

Return type

logging.Logger

static console_handler(level: int, formatter: logging.Formatter)¶

Configures console handler.

Parameters

  • level (int) – Log level

  • formatter (logging.Formatter) – Formatter

Returns

Console handler

Return type

logging.StreamHandler

static file_handler(file: str, mode: str, level: int, formatter: logging.Formatter)¶

Configures file handler.

Parameters

  • file (str) – Log file name

  • mode (str) – Log mode

  • level (int) – Log level

  • formatter (logging.Formatter) – Formatter

Webdriver¶

Title : Webdriver Description : Defines class Webdriver, which uses selenium to connect to, navigate and collect data from the internet. Author : Bernardo Paulsen Version : 1.0.0

class data_collection.news_volume.utilities.webdriver.Webdriver(log_file: str = 'log')¶

Class which uses selenium to connect to, navigate and collect data from the internet.

Parameters

log_file (str, optional) – Log file name, defaults to “log.log”

config() → selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver¶

Configures Chrome webdriver.

get(url: str)¶

Gets url.

Parameters

url (str) – Url to connect to in webdriver

get_elements(xpath: str) → list¶

Gets all elements given xpath expression.

Parameters

xpath (str) – Xpath expression for elements

Returns

Elements which match xpath expression,

Return type

list

Gets element which is inside given element.

Parameters

Returns

Term Structure¶

data_collection.term_structure.load_and_process.create_dataframe_with_columns_as_days_to_expiration(dataframe: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

Creates dataframe where each row is a trading date and each column in the number of days until a contract’s expiration.

data_collection.term_structure.load_and_process.fix_day_in_columns_datetime(dataframe_columns) → pandas.core.series.Series¶

Sets the day for each column datetime to the first working day of the respective month.

All column datetime are at day 1 of each month.

data_collection.term_structure.load_and_process.load_and_process_term_structure_data(dataframe_name: str) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

Loads term structure data and process it so it has, for each day, the time to expiration of each contract with the correspondent price of the contract.

data_collection.term_structure.load_and_process.load_term_structure_data(dataframe_name: str) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

Loads term structure data from .xlsx file, setting the header row and selecting useful columns.

data_collection.term_structure.load_and_process.original_columns_to_datetime(dataframe_columns: list) → pandas.core.series.Series¶

Converts the original column names of the term structure dataframe to datetime objects.

Column names start with the letter of the month of the expiration of the contract. This letter if followed by the last two digits of the year of the expiration of the contract.

data_collection.term_structure.load_and_process.process_columns(dataframe_columns: list) → pandas.core.series.Series¶

Converts the original column names to the day of expiration of each contract.
